name: ObscureCraft
description:
Obscure Craft is a very short game created by 2 friends.

The game is about you bullying some things that look like among us.

CONTROL

The one with black cloth - E to big axe attack

The one with blue cloth - E to shoot, R to use sword

The one with yellow cloth - E while moving to Dash

Enter - Interact

-

Libtul - art, game design

BataXDboi - programming

*this game contains many bugs, restart buttons doesn't even work.

*you can little finish this game within 8 seconds
